name: Dhiren's Town!
description:
Here is the download page for my game! 

Up arrow: to move up

Down arrow: to move down

Left arrow: to move left

Right arrow: to move right

Space bar: to interact with objects and NPCs

Shift: sprint 

Objective of the game:

Interact with the NPCs to get a hint on what object to look for. Items will be scattered around the map which you will have to find and return to that certain NPC. Once you have given 3 correct items to the NPCs, you have beaten the game.

The hints will be quite subtle. For example, An NPC might say “hmmm only if I have something to eat” which means they might want an apple. If you then give that apple to the NPC, you have completed that NPC.
